bomberman.engine

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.engine.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for creating and handling all the monsters elements and events.
    Author:
    Rui Figueira - ei11021, Pedro Faria - ei11167

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Monster(float initialX, float initialY, float speed, int monsterType)
      Constructor of this class.Function responsible for creating the monster.It initializes the monster animations,is current position ,type and speed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkIfIsAlive(Level level)
      Function responsible for checking the alive status of the monster.It checks if he has died to a bomb.
      boolean checkMonsterCollisionsSide(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions left and right.It checks for the monster sprite height if that sprite intersects a blocked element of the level.
      boolean checkMonsterCollisionsUpDown(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions up and down.It checks for the monster sprite width if any pixel intersects a blocked element of the level.

      • Monster

        public Monster(float initialX,
       float initialY,
       float speed,
       int monsterType)
        throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Constructor of this class.Function responsible for creating the monster.It initializes the monster animations,is current position ,type and speed.
        Parameters:
        initialX - X of the initial position
        initialY - Y of the initial position
        speed - Initial speed of the monster
        monsterType - Monster type
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        level - Level where the monster is to be moved

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked(float x,
                float y,
                Level level)
        Function responsible for checking the value of the pixel of the level on the collisions matrix.
        Parameters:
        x - X of the pixel to be checked
        y - Y of the pixel to be checked
        level - Level where the pixel is
        Returns:
        The value of the collision matrix.True if it is to be collided or false otherwise

      • checkMonsterCollisionsSide

        public boolean checkMonsterCollisionsSide(float x,
                                 float y,
                                 Level level)
        Checks for collisions left and right.It checks for the monster sprite height if that sprite intersects a blocked element of the level.
        Parameters:
        x - X of the position of the monster
        y - Y of the position of the monster
        level - Level where the monster is
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to move or false if it isn't

      • checkMonsterCollisionsUpDown

        public boolean checkMonsterCollisionsUpDown(float x,
                                   float y,
                                   Level level)
        Checks for collisions up and down.It checks for the monster sprite width if any pixel intersects a blocked element of the level.
        Parameters:
        x - X of the position of the monster
        y - Y of the position of the monster
        level - Level where the monster is
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to move or false if it isn't
